0.text: Bug 119792  Preview the current selected report automtically in BIRT debugger workbench.

1.text: With M3 build, after the debugger is launched, the user has to manually select the report design, and preview the report.

2.text: In most cases, people expect the debugger will open the current selected report design file, and preview the report automatically.

3.text: This is similar to debug a java application, the java debugger will use the main() as the entry point in the current project, start execute it.

4.text: If the current selected file is not a report design, it should behave as it does now.
